harmonyMsc.recoveryMode.headerDescriptio:
Please read the instructions carefully. Not following the instructions may void the
warranty!
harmonyMsc.recoveryMode.progressModal.wa: Do not disconnect Harmony or interrupt the process!
harmonyMsc.recoveryMode.restartModal.des: Please do not disconnect your Harmony.
harmonyMsc.recoveryMode.terminalSetupMod: Press enter to start the process
Enter your computer password when prompted
Repeat your computer password when prompted
The Terminal was opened in the background
harmonyMsc.recoveryMode.warningConfirmat: I understand that not following these instructions may void the warranty
harmonyMsc.recoveryMode.warningDescripti: Make sure your device is running OS 1.9.0 or later.
Once you start the recovery, it must not be cancelled or interrupted.
Connect your Harmony directly to your computer using the USB C cable and do not disconnect it until the process is complete.
Before starting the recovery, charge your device for 1 hour (or more) from a suitable power outlet.
Make sure your computer is running Ubuntu 22.04 or later.
